answers.answer: Hello,this is a diabetes forum.You would need to consult a dermatologist to see if it is really mildew on your scalp (or something else that just looks like mildew), and to prescribe what to do about it.

question: I just figured out its mildew growing in my scalp all these years. Although very milk. I've used anti fungal shampoo Nd it doesn't wirk. What gets rid of mildew on scalp
